articles.title: Single-Dose Dengue Vaccine Provides Nearly 80% Protection - Technology Networks
articles.description: Results from a Phase 3 clinical trial show that the vaccine is safe and effective for those aged 2–59 regardless of whether they have previously been infected with dengue.
articles.content:
A single-dose vaccine protects nearly 80% of people not previously infected with dengue, according to researchers from the Butantan Institute in Brazil.
